text: The Copa del Generalísimo 1949 Final was the 47th final of the King's Cup. The final was played at Estadio Chamartín in Madrid, on 29 May 1949, being won by Valencia CF, who beat Atlético de Bilbao 1–0. ==Details== {| width="100%" |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" |colspan="4"|Valencia CF: |- !width="25"| !!width="25"| |- |GK ||1|| Ignacio Eizaguirre |- |DF ||2|| Vicente Asensi |- |DF ||3|| Álvaro |- |DF ||4|| Luis Díaz |- |MF ||5|| Salvador Monzó |- |MF ||6|| Antonio Puchades |- |FW ||7|| Epi |- |FW ||8|| Pasieguito |- |FW ||9|| Mundo (c) |- |FW||10|| Silvestre Igoa |- |FW||11|| Vicente Seguí |- |colspan=4|Manager: |- |colspan="4"| Jacinto Quincoces |} |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font- size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" align=center |colspan="4"|Atlético de Bilbao: |- !width="25"| !!width="25"| |- |GK ||1 || Raimundo Lezama |- |DF ||2|| Francisco Celaya |- |DF ||3|| Roberto Bertol (c) |- |DF ||4|| Manuel Barrenechea |- |MF ||5|| José Luis Panizo |- |MF ||6|| Canito |- |FW ||7|| José Luis Bilbao |- |FW ||8|| Venancio |- |FW ||9|| Telmo Zarra |- |FW||10|| Félix Arrieta |- |FW||11|| Agustín Gaínza |- |colspan=4|Manager: |- |colspan="4"| Harry Bagge |- |} |} ==References== 1949 Copa Category:Valencia CF matches Category:Athletic Bilbao matches
title: 1949 Copa del Generalísimo Final
